notes: Schools, Day Care and Camps may now operate with specific guidance developed for the various child care settings.   http://archive.fo/dvcfR
End of mandated working from home - but those who can, should continue to work from home.   http://archive.fo/dvcfR
Increased to groups of 50, can request permission for larger gatherings   http://archive.fo/dvcfR
Commercial airlines may return to Bermuda, but there are specific testing requirements to replace the requirement to quarantine for 14 days.  http://archive.fo/dvcfR

countryname: Note: Data from 02 Jul 2020. Individual countries may be several days older.
